channel.title: Player Saving
channel.description:
I'm using Whitescape source and when I tried to save it doesn't have my characters name in a text file it saves it in a .dat file and when I went into client.java and tinkered around with the "load game" void I added the folder that was necessary and it still didn't work can someone write me a tutorial or help me with this because I'm getting pissed off and I really just wanna finish the rest of my server's things but that is the one thing that is stopping me. -.-
EDIT: STILL GETTING Pissed off... (sorry for caps)

item.title: Player Saving
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

I’m using Whitescape source and when I tried to save it doesn’t have my characters name in a text file it saves it in a .dat file and when I went into client.java and tinkered around with the “load game” void I added the folder that was necessary and it still didn’t work can someone write me a tutorial or help me with this because I’m getting pissed off and I really just wanna finish the rest of my server’s things but that is the one thing that is stopping me. -.-

EDIT: STILL GETTING Pissed off… (sorry for caps)
